      • ROUTE_RECALCULATION_DELAY

        public static final long ROUTE_RECALCULATION_DELAY
        The constant ROUTE_RECALCULATION_DELAY. Defines the time delay (in ms), after which the route-recalculation is executed after an chart-entry was dragged
        See Also:

        public static final int COMPLETE_BREAK

        Constant Field Values

      • MIN_TIME_BETWEEN_BREAKS

        public static final int MIN_TIME_BETWEEN_BREAKS
        The constant MIN_TIME_BETWEEN_BREAKS. Minimum amount of time between two seperate breaks (10 min)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_DRIVE_VAL

        public static final float MAX_DRIVE_VAL
        The constant MAX_DRIVE_VAL. Maximum amount of time the driver is allowed to drive (4.5 hours)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_DRIVE_TOLERANCE

        public static final int MAX_DRIVE_TOLERANCE
        The constant MAX_DRIVER_TOLERANCE. The time tolerance which is given since the driver cannot have his break after exactly 4.5 hours always.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • onTruckMoved

        public void onTruckMoved()
        onTruckMoved-Event is called each second, while the truck is driving. It sets the updated rotation angle of the chart, of the canvas overlay and of the inner clock image.
